modName: ReAL Water - insane0h HD Water replacement overhaul
summary: A custom made water texture replacement for Skyrim - on par with Crysis level water
descriptionHtml:
before after (original texture release)
[youtube]0MuI3VNgCSo[/youtube]

NOTE! Water updated to fix the \"fast flow\" problem and looks much better now =)
(to do this, I used the defaultwater.dds that came with skyrim, scaled it to my texture, and messed around with the opacity settings to get the desired effect) let me know what you all think in the comments section!

Welcome to my finished release for a high resolution water texture replacement for 
Skyrim. The default water looks pretty good in Skyrim, but this small texture mod will 
make it look borderline realistic. This texture is based on a very high resolution photography image, made into a seamless texture and then converted to DDS for use in skyrim.

Default texture size = 512x512
My texture size = 2048x2048

Videos - newest version - fixes some of the problems with the water - much more realistic (also features some unique footage of me jumping off the bridge leading to the college of winterhold!)

before after (original texture release)
[ youtube ] 0MuI3VNgCSo [ /youtube ]

:::INSTALLATION:::

Simply extract the folder to your skyrim/data - if prompted to merge or replace 
files/folders, click yes.

:::UNISTALLATION:::

Simply delete the defaultwater.dds in skyrim\\data\\textures\\water

:::NOTE:::
Note: My version has smoother y-axis depth than others, and it has a small rippling 
effect to simulate water on the surface.

Please check out my other mod - ReAL Sun - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=866&navtag=/downloads/file/tags.php?id=866&tab=5
author: sval

files.name: insane0h water - slower smoother - fixes fast water effect
